verses.verse: O give thanks <WH3034> <WH8685> unto the YY <WH3068>; for he is good <WH2896>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
O give thanks <WH3034> <WH8685> unto the 'Elohim <WH430> of 'elohim <WH430>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
O give thanks <WH3034> <WH8685> to the YY <WH113> of lords <WH113>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
To him who alone doeth <WH6213> <WH8802> great <WH1419> wonders <WH6381> <WH8737>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
To him that by wisdom <WH8394> made <WH6213> <WH8802> the heavens <WH8064>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
To him that stretched out <WH7554> <WH8802> the earth <WH776> above the waters <WH4325>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
To him that made <WH6213> <WH8802> great <WH1419> lights <WH216>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
The sun <WH8121> to rule <WH4475> by day <WH3117>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
The moon <WH3394> and stars <WH3556> to rule <WH4475> by night <WH3915>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
To him that smote <WH5221> <WH8688> Egypt <WH4714> in their firstborn <WH1060>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
And brought out <WH3318> <WH8686> Yisra'EL <WH3478> from among <WH8432> them: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
With a strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and with a stretched out <WH5186> <WH8803> arm <WH2220>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
To him which divided <WH1504> <WH8802> the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220> into parts <WH1506>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
And made Yisra'EL <WH3478> to pass through <WH5674> <WH8689> the midst <WH8432> of it: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
But overthrew <WH5287> <WH8765> Pharaoh <WH6547> and his host <WH2428> in the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
To him which led <WH3212> <WH8688> his people <WH5971> through the wilderness <WH4057>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
To him which smote <WH5221> <WH8688> great <WH1419> kings <WH4428>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
And slew <WH2026> <WH8799> famous <WH117> kings <WH4428>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
Sichon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
And Og <WH5747> the king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
And gave <WH5414> <WH8804> their land <WH776> for an heritage <WH5159>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
Havahn an heritage <WH5159> unto Yisra'EL <WH3478> his servant <WH5650>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Who remembered <WH2142> <WH8804> us in our low estate <WH8216>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
And hath redeemed <WH6561> <WH8799> us from our enemies <WH6862>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Who giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> food <WH3899> to all flesh <WH1320>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
O give thanks <WH3034> <WH8685> unto the 'Elohim <WH410> of heaven <WH8064>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
